GSD.description:
mmc: jz4740: Apply DMA engine limits to maximum segment size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 807f90f1960a59dc557542b818c484a8db9ac978. For more details please see the references link.
